alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 10:41PM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to an inch below 2000 feet and 1 to 2 inches over Whitebird Hill. * WHERE...Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
